reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: New technologies for waste treatment and energy generation that helps accelerate Colombia's transition to a low carbon economy

description.narrative: This project will accelerate Colombia's transition to a low carbon economy by identifying the most feasible, and environmentally friendly methods and technologies suitable for waste treatment and energy generation, enabling to divert more of the residual waste that still exist away from the landfill and to capture renewable energy, and also, ensuring that the residual waste being used has the right renewable content and is matched with a plant that is efficient enough at converting waste to energy.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
